Articles.Content: What are your predictions, hopes, and dreams for the yet-to-be released KSP 0.18 and beyond? I have a feeling we're gonna see some great stuff!
I normally don't like speculating about future releases, but something tells me that we might get docking.

I really want re-entry effects, but I don't think they'll do that until the near end of development for the game . I would also like actual rovers, instead of having to use landing gear. Maybe they should add some music to the game as well.

Time Travel Rule #1:When in Rome, act like the Romans.

I would really like flight planning.
Man, i would looooove some stuff like ion engines. Maybe have like a really high isp with really low thrust!
Better part-section-UI. The current one sucks!
Something also tells me that this thread will be short-lived.
I would be amazed if they made an icy planet.

I would be amazed if they made an icy planet.

Kerbal ski resort!

Someone actually did that.
I was hoping for another moon around Jool
Wouldn't it be amazing if they make Kerbin look much better? It talking about things like deserts, rivers, and maybe a different runway for us to land on.
re-entry heat is something I wanna see, but we probably won't get that until 0.19, mark my words! my predictions are always uncanny!
I wish that solar panels and batteries are coming...
This is starting to get ridiculous.
I'm tired of killing my Kerbals all the time in deep space. Some probe type pods would be great!
Maybe a new planet in between Duna and Jool?
What does it matter? The ancient Kayans predicted that life as we know it on Kerbin will end in two months! Everybody PANIC!!!
pfft end the world us kerbals can do anything ANYTHING

We need a new icy planet far away from kerbol

Also a new Mun around Jool

and make moho to not pverheat your engines
Well i just hope for the world not to end on November!!
I really want a Sputnik command pod so that I can sent up satellites. Maybe called something like Stayputnik?
This is madness!
I don't really like the look of the current engines. I think they are in need of a remake.
I really wish Romfarer was a developer...
Four more years!!
